pkgmetadata.longdescription: Toolkit for Electroencephalography Data // Analysis and visualization tools for electroencephalography (EEG) data. Includes functions for plotting (a) EEG caps, (b) single- and multi-channel EEG time courses, and (c) EEG spatial maps. Also includes smoothing and Independent Component Analysis functions for EEG data analysis, and a function for simulating event- related potential EEG data.
